Description: Lower body sherd of Attic black-figured pottery skyphos; interior glazed black with single added red band; exterior: black-figure bird or sphinx (legs remaining) to right; below two brown-fired lines; rays around lower body, above band at foot join.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1566)
